{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DGL-5500 |revision=A1 |upc=790069394980 |ean= |asin=B00DDK1QUC |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/12/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Cameo |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=KA2GL5500A1 |ic_id=4216A-GL5500A1 |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9558 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16DG-AC |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe (oversized),USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9558 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9882 |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=Admin |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Gaming Router AC1300 with StreamBoost™ Technology}}
{{ProductPage|http://www.dlink.com/us/en/home-solutions/connect/routers/dgl-5500-gaming-router}}
{{SupportPage|vendor=D-Link|model=DGL-5500}} The switch used is likely AR8327N (similar / identical to the AR8327, but w/ hardware NAT support). The default SSID formats ''may'' be '''dlink-XXXX''' and '''dlink-media-XXXX'''. {{WiFiCert|WFA19948|06/05/2013}} ==Additional external links== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32204-d-link-dgl-5500-gaming-router-ac1300-with-streamboost-technology-reviewed Reviewed on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Wikis=== *{{TechInfoDepot|D-Link_DGL-5500_rev_A1}} *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dgl-5500 On the '''OpenWrt Wiki'''] ===News=== *[http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/d-link-gaming-router-now-vailable-for-pre-order-211779891.html '''''D-Link® Gaming Router Now Available for Pre-Order''''' - Press release on '''PRNewswire'''] *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/6551/dlink-at-ces-2013-multiple-80211ac-routers-ip-camera-solutions Blurb on '''AnandTech''' @ CES 2013] :notes that the radio was confirmed as the 2x2 QCA9882 ===Vendors=== *[http://www.rakuten.com/prod/1300ac-802-3-u-ab-wl-dual-band-perpgaming-router/250598379.html On '''Rakuten'''] :UPC: 790069394980, Rakuten SKU: 250598379 *[http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16833127525 On '''Newegg'''] *[http://accessories.dell.com/sna/productdetail.aspx?c=ca&l=en&s=dhs&cs=cadhs1&sku=a7113318 @ the '''Dell''' store] __NOTOC__
